Class com.bastel.democomp.Bus 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.bastel.democomp.ComponentListener
           |
           +----com.bastel.democomp.Bus
public abstract class Bus
extends ComponentListener
This class represents a Bus

Version:
0.1
Author:
Beno Kurmann, Michel Marti

ADDRESS_BUS
ID of Address Bus
CONTROL_BUS
ID of Control Bus
DATA_BUS
ID of Data Bus

Bus(int, String)
Creates a new Bus object

broadcast(Word, int)
Gives a word to all Components listening on the Bus
reset()
Reset's the Bus.

ADDRESS_BUS 
 public static final String ADDRESS_BUS
ID of Address Bus

DATA_BUS 
 public static final String DATA_BUS
ID of Data Bus

CONTROL_BUS 
 public static final String CONTROL_BUS
ID of Control Bus

Bus 
 public Bus(int width,
            String id)
Creates a new Bus object

Parameters:
width - Bus width in bits
id - Bus Identification, allowed ID's are: ADDRESS_BUS, DATA_BUS or CONTROL_BUS

broadcast 
 public void broadcast(Word word,
                       int address) throws IllegalAccessException
Gives a word to all Components listening on the Bus

Parameters:
Word - BusWord the word to transmit
String - id Object-Identification. Will be used for communication issues
Throws: IllegalAccessException
If the width of the word to transmit is larger than the Bus width
Overrides:
broadcast in class ComponentListener
reset 
 public void reset() throws IOException
Reset's the Bus. All Listeners will get informed about this.

Overrides:
reset in class ComponentListener
